extension.summary: Dash Radio
extension.description: Litt Live (stylized as LITT Live, formerly Dash Radio) is a digital radio broadcasting platform with over 80 radio stations. These stations are curated by DJs, radio personalities, musicians, etc. The platform includes partner stations curated by Snoop Dogg, Kylie Jenner, Lil Wayne, Tech N9ne, Borgore, B-Real of Cypress Hill, and others. Dash Radio has no subscription fees and is commercial-free.
extension.disclaimer: The author is not responsible for the use of this addon. The author is not responsible for the content found using this addon. The author does not host or own any content found within this addon.[CR]The author is in no way affiliated with Kodi, Team Kodi, or the XBMC Foundation.[CR]This is a Non-profit resource, organized solely for educational purposes which is protected under the Fair-Use doctrine of the Copyright Act, Specifically section 107, which does promote freedom of expression, by permitting the unlicensed use of copyright-protected works.

extension.news:
[COLOR lavender][B]Order Favourites[/B][/COLOR] [B]1.2.1:[/B] - Experimental Matrix version now available.
[B]1.2.0:[/B] - Fixed a case when the add-on failed to read the favourites file because of Unicode strings. (Thanks to [I]msauers[/I] for the report.) - Changed the label and description of the 'Restart...' button to 'Restore...', which is clearer.
[B]1.1.1:[/B] - Added menu items for a more traditional add-on UX. - Improved the profile reloading process.
[B]1.1.0:[/B] - Improved the profile reloading process, it was crashing on Kodi 17.6.
[B]1.0.4:[/B] - Safer handling of unicode text. - Optimizations, simplified the code even more.
[B]1.0.3:[/B] - Added a proper custom dialog interface. - Greatly simplified the code, much faster to use.
[B]1.0.2:[/B] - Fix for when the favorite item has unicode text.

extension.summary: A Streamlined Utility Tool for Kodi
extension.description: No Bloatware, no Nonsense! Just Keep your Kodi sharp and clean with this utility tool... Now with a Custom Wizard.
extension.news:
2023.01.09.0 - Added AutoClean Cache functionality every x days at a given hour. - Backup always replaced the home folder reference in xml files with special://home Not all addons can handle this replace so it is now possible via a setting to disable this. - Backup Cancel didn't work. This is now fixed.
2023.01.01.0 - Fix a fix on 2022.12.28.0
2022.12.28.0 - Fix crash with full backup when there are foreign, like Hebrew, characters in xml files
2021.12.19.0 - Made kodi 19 (Matrix) compatible.
2021.11.03.0 - Fix Speedtest crash.
2020.12.19.1 - The plugin was also installed under Video add-ons. Now it only is in Program add-ons where it belongs - Clean removed some files created by Common plugin cache or StorageServer or script.common.plugin.cache at kodi startup. This resulted in breaking cache functionality of kodi - Upload kodi log file to pastebin didn't always work and the first bytes were binary characters - Made all decode calls UTF-8 - Improved ADVANCED SETTINGS(BUFFER SIZE) functionality

extension.summary: OpenSubtitles by OpenSubtitles.org
extension.description: [CR]Anonymously search and download subtitles for movies and TV-Series from OpenSubtitles.org without log-in. Search in 75 languages, 4.000.000+ subtitles, daily updates.[CR][CR]Made by Burekas[CR]Thanks to: amet, opensubtitles.[CR][CR]For news, updates and more info - Visit: https://bit.ly/3DaU7JT[CR][CR]Burekas Repo: https://bit.ly/49mJge3
extension.disclaimer: Works without log-in
extension.news: Improved add-on by burekas for OpenSubtitles.org. - Users are able to download subtitles as anonymous without authentication. Added localized descriptions, media files - Users are able to check for subtitles when Kodi is not playing, by using the manual search or by standing on an item and opening the subtitles search dialog (By key or by an external addon) | @burekas
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

extension.description: Heeltemal oor ontwerp om 'n moderne aansig te skep, terwyl die klassieke Aeon gevoel behou word.
Komplett neu designed für ein modernes Aussehen und das klassische Aeon-Feeling beizubehalten.
Πλήρως επανασχεδιασμένο για να προσφέρει μια μοντέρνα αισθητική, διατηρώντας ταυτόχρονα την κλασική ομορφιά του Aeon.
Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Completamente rediseñado para crear un aspecto moderno, pero conservando el toque clásico Aeon.
Täielikult uuesti disainitud, et luua tänapäevane välimus samas säilitades klassikaline Aeoni tunnetus.
Täysin uudelleensuunniteltu moderni ulkoasu, kuitenkin tuntuen klassiselta Aeonilta.
Complètement remanié pour créer une apparence moderne, tout en conservant l’esprit classique d’Aeon.
Totalement revu pour créer un look moderne, en gardant l'expérience Aeon.
Redeseñado completamente para crear unha aparencia moderna ao tempo que mantén a sensación do clásico Aeon.
עיצוב חדש היוצר מראה מודרני אך משמר את ההרגשה של Aeon הקלאסי.
Potpuno preoblikovan moderan izgled, uz zadržani klasični Aeon osjećaj.
Teljesen áttervezett modern kinézet, de megtartva a klasszikus Aeon érzetet.
Endurhannað nútímalegt útlit í anda Aeon.
Completamente ridisegnato per creare un look moderno, mantenendo la consueta qualità Aeon.
고전적인 Aeon 느낌을 유지하면서 현대적인 모습으로 완전히 다시 디자인하여 만들었습니다.
Pilnai atnaujinta, kad sukurtų modernią išvaizdą, išlaikant klasikinio Aeon pojūtį.
Direka semula sepenuhnya untuk hasilkan penampilan modern, tetapi masih mengekalkan penampilan Aeon klasik.
Helt redesignet for å tilby en moderne utforming, samtidig som den klassiske Aeon-følelsen er beholdt.
Volledig opnieuw ontworpen om een ​​moderne look te creëren, met behoud van het klassieke Aeon-gevoel.
Całkowicie przeprojektowana skóra Aeon, o nowoczesnym wyglądzie, zachowując klasyczny układ skóry Aeon.
Design completamente novo para criar um look moderno, mantendo o feeling do Aeon Clássico.
Completamente redesenhado para criar um visual moderno enquanto retém o toque clássico Aeon.
Complet reproiectat pentru a crea o înfățișare modernă, dar totuși păstrând atmosfera clasică Aeon.
Полностью переработан, чтобы создать современный облик, сохраняя при этом классическое чувство Aeon.
Kompletne prepracovaný dizajn s moderným vzhľadom pri zachovaní klasického štýlu Aeon.
Totalt omarbetad för att skapa ett modernt utseende, samtidigt som man behåller den klassiska Aeon-känslan.
การออกแบบใหม่หมดจด เพื่อสร้างรูปลักษณ์ทันสมัย, ​​ขณะที่ยังคงความรู้สึกคลาสสิคของ Aeon.
Modern görünüme kavuşturmak için baştan tasarlandı, klasik Aeon hissi korundu
Thiết kế lại hoàn toàn để tạo nên một phong cách hiện đại, trong khi đó vẫn duy trì một cảm giác Aeon cổ điển.
完全的翻新設計以創造現代化的視覺感受，同時仍維持Aeon的經典外觀。
extension.news: [I][COLOR FFFF9800]v10.0.1[/COLOR][/I][CR]- Vertical menu mouse fix[CR]- Fix playlist statistics infoline being empty[CR][TABS]1[/TABS][LIGHT](still needs Embuary Helper installed and enabled)[/LIGHT][CR][I][COLOR FFFF9800]v10.0.0[/COLOR][/I][CR]- Fix navigation issue in Music OSD settings[CR]- Add SceneMarkers, Cuts, & Editlist markers to seekbar[CR]- Add trakt comments to recommendations dialog[CR]- Add music video icon to default List view for music and a button to play "Video links" in DialogMusicInfo[CR]- Tweaks to channel Wall for PVR[CR]- Some Live Background fixes thx davewuk[CR][CR][B]All updates may contain various changes and/or improvements[/B][CR]For a more complete list visit:[CR][I][COLOR FFFF9800]https://github.com/MikeSiLVO/skin.aeon.nox.silvo/commits/master[/COLOR][/I]

extension.summary: Klar, minimalistisch, elegant, einfach, leicht. Basiert auf dem original Arctic: Zephyr Skin von jurialmunkey.
Clean, minimal, elegant, simple, light. Based on the original Arctic: Zephyr skin by jurialmunkey.
Clean, minimal, elegant, simple, light. Based on the original Arctic: Zephyr skin by jurialmunkey.
Clean, minimal, elegant, simple, light. Based on the original Arctic: Zephyr skin by jurialmunkey.
Limpio, minimalista, elegante, simple, ligero. Basado en el original Arctic: Zephyr skin por jurialmunkey.
Clair, minimaliste, élégant, simple et léger. Basé sur le skin original Arctic: Zephyr par jurialmunkey.
Net, minimal, élégant, simple, léger. Basé sur le skin original Arctic: Zephyr par jurialmunkey.
Švari, minimali, elegantiška, paprasta, lengva. Basato sull'originale Arctic: Zephyr skin di jurialmunkey.
Schoon, minimaal, elegant, simpel, licht. Gebaseerd op de originele Arctic: Zephyr skin door jurialmunkey.
Prosta, minimalista, elegancka i lekka. Na podstawie oryginalnego skinu Arctic: Zephyr autorstwa jurialmunkey.
Curat, minimalist, elegant, simplu, ușor. Bazat pe pielea originală Arctic: Zephyr de jurialmunkey.
Опрятный, минималистичный, элегантный, простой, светлый. Основано на оригинальном скине Arctic: Zephyr от jurialmunkey.
extension.description: Arctic: Zephyr - Reloaded basiert auf dem original Arctic: Zephyr Skin von jurialmunkey und ist ein minimalistisches, klares und simples Interface für deine Medien mit dem gewissen Etwas.
Arctic: Zephyr - Reloaded is based on original Arctic: Zephyr skin, created by jurialmunkey. Arctic focuses on being simple, clean and minimalistic with a light spin.
Arctic: Zephyr - Reloaded is based on original Arctic: Zephyr skin, created by jurialmunkey. Arctic focuses on being simple, clean and minimalistic with a light spin.
Arctic: Zephyr - Reloaded is based on original Arctic: Zephyr skin, created by jurialmunkey. Arctic focuses on being simple, clean and minimalistic with a light spin.
Arctic: Zephyr - Reloaded est basé sur le skin original Arctic: Zephyr, créé par jurialmunkey. Arctic se focalise sur le fait d'être simple, claire et minimaliste.

extension.summary: Eminence
extension.description: Eminence is a skin that aims to be clean, clear, simple and modern.
Eminence est un thème qui vise à être clair, simple et moderne.

extension.description: Estuary is die bestek oortreksel vir Kodi 17.0 en op. Dit poog om maklik te wees vir eerste keer Kodi gebruikers om te verstaan en te gebruik.
Estuary هو المظهر الافتراضي ل كودي الإصدار 17.0 و أعلى. يطمح بأن يكون سهل الاستخدام والفهم لمستخدمين كودي الجدد.
Estuary - прадвызначаная абалонка для Kodi 17.0 і пазнейшых версій. Яна будзе простай і зразумелай для карыстальнікаў, якія не мелі досведу працы з Kodi.
Estuary е стандартният облик на Kodi 17 и по-новите версии. Целта е да се улеснят хората, които се сблъскват за първи път с Kodi.
Estuary és l'aparença predeterminada de Kodi 17.0 i posteriors. Per als usuaris per primera vegada de Kodi, intenta ser fàcil d'entendre i d'utilitzar.
Estuary je výchozí vzhled pro Kodi 17.0 a vyšší. Snaží se být jednoduše pochopitelný a použitelný pro nové uživatele Kodi.
Estuary er standardbrugerfladen for Kodi 17.0 og højere. Det forenkler førstegangsbrugen af Kodi ved at gøre det nemmere at forstå og bruge.
Estuary ist der Standardskin für Kodi 17.0 und höher. Ziel war es, einen einfach zu bedienenden Skin für neue Kodi-Benutzer zu entwickeln.
Το Estuary είναι η προεπιλεγμένη αμφίεση για τις εκδόσεις Kodi 17.0 και άνω. Επιχειρεί να είναι προσιτό στους αρχάριους χρήστες του Kodi για να το κατανοήσουν και να το χρησιμοποιήσουν.
Estuary is the default skin for Kodi 17.0 and above. It attempts to be easy for first time Kodi users to understand and use.
Estuary is the default skin for Kodi 17.0 and above. It attempts to be easy for first time Kodi users to understand and use.
Estuary is the default skin for Kodi 17.0 and above. It attempts to be easy for first time Kodi users to understand and use.
Estuary es el skin por defecto para Kodi 17.0 y posteriores. Intenta ser fácil de entender y utilizar para los usuarios Kodi primerizos.
Estuary es el skin por defecto para Kodi 17.0 o superior. Su objetivo es la facilidad de comprensión y uso para usuarios primerizos de Kodi.
Estuary es la máscara por defecto para Kodi 17.0 y superior. Su objetivo es ser fácil de entender y usar para los usuarios nuevos a Kodi.
Estuary on Kodi vaikerüü versioonist 17.0. Kodi esmakasutajatel on rüüd kerge mõista ja kasutada.
Estuary azala kodi 17.0 eta berriagoen azal lehenetsia da. Kodiren erabiltzaile hasiberrientzako erabilerraza eta ulerterraza izaten saiatzen da.
اسچوری پوستهٔ پیش‌گزیدهٔ کودی ۱۷٫۰ و بالاتر است. این پوسته تلاش می‌کند درک و استفاده‌اش برای کاربرانی که نخستین بار با کودی کار می‌کنند، ساده باشد.
Estuary on Kodin oletusulkoasu alkaen versiosta 17.0. Sen on tarkoitus olla uusille Kodi-käyttäjille selkeä ja helppokäyttöinen.
Estuary est l’habillage par défaut pour Kodi 17.0 et ultérieure. Il s’efforce d’être facile à comprendre et à utiliser pour les utilisateurs débutants de Kodi.
Estuary est l'habillage d'origine pour Kodi 17.0 et supérieur. Il est facile à comprendre et à utiliser pour les utilisateurs novices de Kodi.
Estuary é a pel predefinida para Kodi 17.0 e superior. Esta tenta ser doada de entender e usar polos usuarios recen chegados a Kodi.
Estuary היא מעטפת ברירת המחדל של קודי מגרסאות 17.0 ומעלה. מטרת מעטפת זו היא להיות פשוטה לשימוש ולהכרה ראשונית על ידי משתמשים חדשים.
Estuary je zadana presvlaka za Kodi 17.0 i novije inačice. To je pokušaj da se novim korisnicima olakša prvo korištenje i kasnija upotreba Kodija.
Az Estuary az alapértelmezett felszín a 17.0 és újabb Kodi kiadásokban. Megpróbál könnyen kezelhető és használható lenni, az újonc Kodi felhasználóknak is.
Estuary adalah skin default untuk Kodi 17.0 dan di atasnya. Ini untuk mudah dipahami dan digunakan oleh pengguna Kodi yang pertama kali.
Estuary er sjálfgefið skinn fyrir Kodi 17.0 og nýrri. Með því á að vera auðvelt fyrir fyrsta-skiptis Kodi-notendur að skilja og nota viðmótið.
Estuary è la skin predefinita di Kodi 17.0 e successivi. Cerca di essere facile da capire e da usare per chi si avvicina per la prima volta a Kodi.
EstuaryはKodi 17.0およびそれ以上のバージョンで標準のスキンです。ユーザーが初めてKodiに触れる際にわかりやすく使えるようにしてあります。
Estuary는 Kodi 17.0이상의 기본 스킨입니다. 처음 Kodi를 접하는 사용자가 쉽게 이해하고 사용할 수 있도록 만들었습니다.
Estuary yra numatytoji Kodi 17.0 ir aukštesnių versijų teminė išvaizda. Jos tikslas yra būti lengvai perprantama naujiems Kodi vartotojams.
Estuary ialah kulit lalai untuk Kodi 17.0 dan ke atas. Kulit yang mudah digunakan buat pengguna Kodi kali pertama untuk memahami dan menggunakannya.
Estuary er forvalgt drakt til Kodi 17.0 og nyere. Det tar mål av seg å være en enkel drakt for førstegangsbrukere av Kodi, slik at det er til å forstå og kan brukes.
Estuary is de standaardskin voor Kodi 17.0 en hoger. Het tracht eenvoudig te begrijpen en te gebruiken te zijn voor beginnende Kodi-gebruikers.
Eustary jest domyślną skórą Kodi dla wersji 17.0 i późniejszych. Jest próbą łatwego wprowadzenia początkujących użytkowników w funkcje Kodi.
Estuary é a skin padrão para o Kodi 17.0 e acima. Objetiva ser fácil para usuários que iniciam no Kodi pela primeira vez, facilitando aprendizagem de uso do mesmo.
O Estuary é o visual por omissão para o Kodi 17.0 e posteriores. Tenta ser simples para os utilizadores menos experientes do Kodi compreenderem e usarem.
Estuary este tema implicită pentru Kodi 17.0 și versiunile ulterioare. Încearcă să fie ușor de înțeles și folosit pentru utilizatorii care folosesc Kodi pentru prima dată.
Estuary — это стандартная обложка Kodi, начиная с версии 17.0. Простая и понятная в использовании для новых пользователей Kodi.
Estuary je predvolený vzhľad pre Kodi 17.0 a vyššie. Je výsledkom snahy o vzhľad, ktorý bude ľahko zrozumiteľný a použiteľný pre nových používateľov Kodi.
Estuary је подразумевана маска за Kodi 17.0 и изнад. Покушава да буде једноставан за разумевање и коришћење новим корисницима Kodi-ја.
Estuary je podrazumevana maska za Kodi 17.0 i iznad. Pokušava da bude jednostavan za razumevanje i korišćenje novim korisnicima Kodija.
Estuary är standardskalet för Kodi 17.0 och uppåt. Det är utformat för att vara lättförståeligt och användarvänligt för förstagångsanvändare av Kodi.
Estuary je wychodnōm skōrōm Kodi dlŏ wersyje 17.0 i dalszych. Prōbuje być proste dlŏ używŏczōw, dlŏ kerych Kodi je nowe
Estuary คือหน้าตาเริ่มต้นของ Kodi 17.0 และสูงกว่า เป็นความพยายามที่จะทำให้ง่ายสำหรับผู้ใช้ Kodi ในครั้งแรก ที่จะเข้าใจและใช้งาน
Estuary Kodi 17.0 ve yukarısı için varsayılan dış görünümdür. İlk kez Kodi kullananlar için anlaşılması ve kullanımı kolaydır.
Estuary є стандартною обкладинкою Kodi 17.0 і подальших версій. Її основна ідея — простота використання для нових користувачів Kodi.
Estuary là giao diện mặc định cho Kodi 17.0 trở lên. Nó dễ dàng cho người dùng Kodi lần đầu tiên hiểu và sử dụng.
Estuary 是 Kodi 17.0 的默认皮肤。它力求使首次使用 Kodi 的用户易于上手。
Estuary是Kodi 17.0開始搭載的預設佈景主題。主要在讓第一次使用 Kodi 的使用者可以簡單地上手。
extension.disclaimer: Estuary is die bestek oortreksel vir Kodi, verwydering mag probleme veroorsaak
Estuary هو المظهر الافتراضي ل كودي, إزالته قد تسبب بعض المشاكل
Estuary - прадвызначаная абалонка для Kodi. Яе выдаленне можа прывесці да праблем
Estuary е стандартният облик на Kodi. Премахването му може да предизвика проблеми
Estuary és l'aparença predeterminada de Kodi, si s'elimina pot causar problemes
Estuary je výchozí vzhled pro Kodi, jeho odebrání může způsobit problémy
Estuary yw croen diofyn Kodi. Efallai bydd ei dynnu yn achosi problemau
Estuary er standard brugerfladen. Fjernes det kan der opstå problemer.
Estuary ist der Standardskin von Kodi. Ein Entfernen des Skins kann Probleme verursachen
Το Estuary είναι η προεπιλεγμένη αμφίεση για το Kodi. Η αφαίρεσή του μπορεί να δημιουργήσει προβλήματα.
Estuary is the default skin for Kodi, removing it may cause issues
Estuary is the default skin for Kodi, removing it may cause issues
Estuary is the default skin for Kodi, removing it may cause issues
Estuary es el skin por defecto de Kodi. Borrarlo puede causar problemas
Estuary es el skin por defecto de Kodi, quitarlo puede causar problemas
Estuary es la máscara predeterminada de Kodi, eliminarla puede causar problemas
Estuary on Kodi vaikerüü, selle eemaldamine võib põhjustada probleeme
Estuary Kodiren azal lehenetsia da. Ezabatzeak arazoak eragin ditzake
اسچوری پوستهٔ پیش‌گزیدهٔ کودی است. ممکن است برداشتنش موجب مشکلاتی شود
Estuary on Kodin oletusulkoasu ja sen poisto voi aiheuttaa ongelmia
Estuary est l’habillage par défaut de Kodi, le supprimer peut créer des problèmes
Estuary est l'habillage d'origine de Kodi, le retirer peut créer des problèmes
Estuary é a pel predefinida para Kodi e eliminala pode causar problemas.
Estuary היא מעטפת ברירת המחדל של קודי, הסרתה עלולה לגרום לתקלות
Estuary je zadana presvlaka za Kodi, njegovo uklanjanje može uzrokovati poteškoće
Az Estuary az alapértelmezett Kodi felszín. Eltávolítása problémákat okozhat
Estuary adalah skin default untuk Kodi, menghapusnya dapat menyebabkan masalah
